MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G15 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:10pm to make a repair on an underground cable on Fruin Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:46pm on 5th January 2021
